r.d: This program reformat and beautify PHP source code files automatically. The program is Open Source and distributed under the terms of PHP Licence. It is written in PHP 5 and has a command line tool.
r.n: - Bug fix's fix: fix incorrect solution on 0.0.6 for incorrect new life after ending curly brace inside double quotes. (Simon Mundy) - Bug fix: space after T_EXIT and T_EVAL - Documentation error: Fixed some errors on command line docs. + Added new test (very limited): Beautifier_Common.phpt
